title: Universe/Frames/AxesParametrisedAxisRotation
description: Configuration for AxesParametrisedAxisRotation axes in frames plugin

parent.description: Name of axes to be used as parent frame for the parametrised rotation axes

angle.description: Scalar time evaluable expression for angle

partials.description: If you know that the anle evaluable has no non-zero partial derivatives wrt to tracked parameters, you can set this to false for optimisation

delta.description: delta for time derivative of angle using central difference
